column5: Had my crossbow in the classifieds for 3 hrs(ya I know it was a steal) Hey, I got the trade in offer,and a MEMBER got a great deal. WIN WIN. Nice to meet DanialM and FishTank. Hope you get a deer of a life time fishtank.  Danial,thanks for finding that screw for me.LOL
you had a crossbow for sale dang I have been looking for one.
I know that we have one of the most efficient classifieds sections around. I just took advantage of the classifieds today even! Good on ya Brian.
Good stuff Brian !.. I sold a truck today, in less than 24 hours!
Right after you posted,I remembered you saying something about that. Sry bud.
Wayne, you sold a vehicle in less than 24hrs???? It was either a good deal or you found a gullible sucker! Good on ya! Glad it worked out!
Suckers born every day my friend..
Did i hear correctly??... GCD bought a truck?
Did you get a new bow ? what kind do you have ? . Im shooting a compound. bowtech 101st ariborn. all the guys i hunt with shoot excal x bows
Why would I buy a truck???... I already have the ultimate truck!!!    Wipe that white stuff off your lips if they start to pucker when you see this pic boy!
Sold two boats that werent even mine.................
I haven’t had any hits on my add yet.  I guess know one wants to trade up a 25Hp motor for a 15Hp Merc, plus a little cash on top..  I’ll get rid of the thing eventually

Misfish thank you for the cross bow it was a great deal. I couldn't believe what great shap it was in. I thought for that price it would be all beat up or maybe even damaged but I was wrong it is awsome. Thank you once again. its always great to meet OFC members you guys are great.

Sure did Rich. Today I changed my mind and got this set up. TALK ABOUT FAST.  35YRD SHOT,THE DEER WONT EVEN HAVE TIME TO FLICKER.    Sidewinder™ Crossbow Package  •185 lb. draw weight •New longer barrel for increased power stroke •Film Dipped in Next Generation G-1 camo •Anodized machined aluminum barrel •Molded stock with comfortable thumbhole grip and adjustable fore-end •Aluminum trigger guard •Ambidextrous safety lever •Automatically engages safety when cocked •7/8" Fixed Mount Metal Scope Rail •Fully rubber coated foot stirrup •Sturdy arrow hold down for added safety  Comes complete with: •TruGlo 4x32 Multi-Reticle Scope •Four 20 Inch Charger Crossbow bolts with Flat Nock •6 arrow Quick Detach Quiver     Specifications  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Mass Weight: 8 lbs -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Overall Length: 38" -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Overall Width: 28.5 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Power Strokes: 12.5" -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Speed: 310 fps with Charger Bolt with 100 grain tip
Making up for "other" short comings are we?   Nice truck anyways... I got a ford f150
Crossbow is all wrong for you Terry...you will need something much more powerful to get a fish out of Temagami
I was going to get tips for the bolts,  like the ones Rambo used. now that will catch fish
